title: How to Hack Five Nights at Freddy's 2

steps.title: Begin a new game or open your saved game.
steps.content: Begin a new game or open your saved game. This cheat allows you to immediately jump to 6 AM on any night, so it doesn't really matter where you start.

steps.title: Locate the poster on the left wall of the office that shows Bonnie, Freddy, and Chica.
steps.content: Locate the poster on the left wall of the office that shows Bonnie, Freddy, and Chica. It's under some wires that are hanging on the ceiling and says "Celebrate!" on the bottom.

steps.title: Move your pointer so that it covers Freddy's nose on the poster.
steps.content: Move your pointer so that it covers Freddy's nose on the poster. The cheat will not work if your cursor is anywhere else. You don't have to hold the mouse button down, just make sure the cursor covers his nose. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Press the C, D, and + buttons to automatically survive the night.
steps.content: Press the C, D, and + buttons to automatically survive the night. It's important to note this will only work if you have a number pad on your keyboard (the number and symbol keys that are set to the right of the other keys) so that you can press the actual "+" key. It won't work if you have a smaller keyboard and have to press SHIFT and the + key at the top of the keyboard (next to the delete key).

steps.title: Close any open games you may have running.
steps.content: Close any open games you may have running. This won't work if FNAF2 is open.

steps.title: Open Run ({{keypress{Win|R}}) and type %appdata%.
steps.content: Open Run ({{keypress{Win|R}}) and type %appdata%. This will bring you to a folder that contains the app settings and data files that are associated with the apps on your computer. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Open the "Roaming" folder.
steps.content: Open the "Roaming" folder. There will be a lot of files in this folder--the one you want is a folder called "MMFApplications." Find it by scrolling through the files or press Ctrl + F and type "MMFApplications" in the search bar. When you find MMFApplications, open the folder.

steps.title: Find the file "freddy2" and right click on the file.
steps.content: Find the file "freddy2" and right click on the file. Select "Open with" from the pop-up menu and choose Notepad.

steps.title: Erase the contents of the file and type in or paste the following code to unlock the game:
steps.content: Erase the contents of the file and type in or paste the following code to unlock the game: beatgame=1 beat6=1 cine=1 level=5 turn=2 c10=1 c9=1 c8=1 c7=1 c6=1ggf c5=1 c4=1 c3=1 c2=1 c1=1

steps.title: Save the file and then open the game to play.
steps.content: Save the file and then open the game to play. You will now have access to "Custom Night" and "Night 6." You will also have all the "Plushies" and all three stars.

steps.title: Download an app management tool onto your computer.
steps.content: Download an app management tool onto your computer. This will allow you to access and alter the system files on your phone. Try iFunbox, which is free and can be downloaded from the internet.

steps.title: Plug your device into your computer.
steps.content: Plug your device into your computer. Make sure the game isn't running or the hack will not work.

steps.title: Open up the app management program and select "User Applications."
steps.content: Open up the app management program and select "User Applications." This will show a list of all the apps on your phone. Scroll down until you find Five Night's at Freddy's 2 and double click to open it. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Open the "Documents" folder and look for a file called "freddy2."
steps.content: Open the "Documents" folder and look for a file called "freddy2." Right click on the file and select "Copy to Mac." Save it to your desktop so you can find it right away. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Open the "freddy2" file on your desktop.
steps.content: Open the "freddy2" file on your desktop. Delete what is written there (it will just tell you which night you are currently on). To unlock everything in the game (custom nights, plushies, stars), type or paste the following into the document: [5] X Research source beatgame=1 beat6=1 cine=1 level=5 turn=2 c10=1 c9=1 c8=1 c7=1 c6=1 c5=1 c4=1 c3=1 c2=1 c1=1

steps.title: Save the file and close it.
steps.content: Save the file and close it. Then drag it back into the app management tool (you should still have the "Documents" folder open for FNAF2) and it will replace the old "freddy2" file.

steps.title: Open the game.
steps.content: Open the game. It will show that you are on night six and you should have three stars. You will be able to access all the different custom nights, like "Ladies Night," "Cupcake Challenge," "Golden Freddy," and many more.

steps.title: Open FNaF 2.
steps.content: Open FNaF 2. Stay on the Main Menu while you are doing this step.

steps.title: Press keys C, D, and 2 all at the same time.
steps.content: Press keys C, D, and 2 all at the same time.

steps.title: Play night 7 or 6.
steps.content: Play night 7 or 6. You may not have all the plushies on your desk or skip to the fifth night, but you can play the 6th and 7th night while cheating without step 2.
